attributes.action: Keep Britain in the EU. Keep David Cameron as leader.
attributes.background: We the undersigned call upon HM Government to have a second referendum for the EU membership and David Cameron should remain as leader moving forward even beyond the party conference in October, following a remain result.

rejection.details:
The resignation of an individual Minister, including the Prime Minister, is not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole. It is a decision for the individual concerned. The UK Government or Parliament cannot stop a Minister resigning.

We already have a petition open calling for a second referendum: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/133753
